issue.title: test on powerful machines to debug larger jobs
multithread creation of virtual machines
issue.body:
``` python
from threading import Thread
from time import sleep

def threaded_function(arg):
    for i in range(arg):
        print "running"
        sleep(1)


if __name__ == "__main__":
    thread = Thread(target = threaded_function, args = (10, ))
    thread.start()
    thread.join()
    print "thread finished...exiting"
```

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/2905965/creating-threads-in-python

issue.title: redo using class oriented design
issue.body:
one class per OS. 

something like a list of operating systems would be more scalable design in the future.

issue.title: Folder Migration for larger projects
issue.body:
By default, Vagrant shares your project directory (remember, that is the one with the Vagrantfile) 

source : https://docs.vagrantup.com/v2/getting-started/synced_folders.html
